sentences.english: Bu Shao’s mother, a high school teacher, has misgivings.
sentences.chinese: 但是邵的中學教師媽媽有疑慮。

sentences.english: The results were welcomed by Andrew Shao, PhD, vice president, scientific and regulatory affairs, for the Council for Responsible Nutrition (CRN), a supplements trade association.
sentences.chinese: 結果受科學和管理事務理事會安德魯邵博士的歡迎。

sentences.english: Because the hardness is the Shore hardness of Shore, it is therefore not to speak of conversion.
sentences.chinese: 因爲肖氏硬度就是邵氏硬度，故無換算關係可言。

sentences.english: Shao Changrong, the famous expert of TCM, can use triple warmer separating therapy to treat turbid phlegm cough.
sentences.chinese: 名中醫邵長榮教授應用三焦辨證法治療痰濁咳嗽。

sentences.english: Shao xiaomao told Cao Zheng suburbs a puzzling fire broke out in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 邵小毛告訴曹政市郊農村發生了一場莫名其妙的火災。

first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers

pitchpipe, pitch standard, one of the twelve semitones in the traditional tone system

surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
